problem_text_cn: 如图所示，ST=6，WX=5，△SRT的周长为15，三角形WZX的周长为Mul(PerimeterOfTriangle(SRT),RatioOfSimilarTriangle(WZX,SRT))，三角形WZX相似于三角形SRT。求△WZX的周长。
problem_text_en: As shown in the diagram, ST=6, WX=5, the perimeter of triangle SRT is 15, the perimeter of triangle WZX is Mul(PerimeterOfTriangle(SRT),RatioOfSimilarTriangle(WZX,SRT)), triangle WZX is similar to triangle SRT.. Find the perimeter of triangle WZX.
